name: css-font-family
description: Css module of single purpose classes for font family

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-font-family.css > css/css-font-family.css && tachyons src/css-font-family.css --minify > css/css-font-family.min.css && tachyons src/css-font-family.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
